about: I was born and still live in Criciúma, Santa Catarina, together with my wife, my dog Amora, and my cat Figma. I've been working with product design since 2016, and I'm currently a senior at Locaweb, responsible for the KingHost dashboard and app, as well as the design system.
locaweb-description: Locaweb Design System is LWSA's multibranding design system.
letsui-description: Let’s UI is a complete, open-source multibranding design system, created to make interfaces fully fluid.
book-description: This book covers everything from initial planning, style and token definition, to components, microinteractions, and documentation, showing how multidisciplinary teams can work efficiently.
